item.title: 中国经济出现新的疲软迹象，中国官员难有喘息机会
item.description: 最近一系列令人沮丧的指标削弱了人们对中国 7 月份经济表现的预期，这是对 2024 年余下时间的一个不祥征兆，也表明除了在世界第二大经济体的痛点上贴膏药之外，还需要更多的刺激措施。【原文：A recent string of dismal indicators have dulled expectations for China's economic performance in July, in an ominous sign for the rest of 2024 and pointing to the need for more stimulus measures beyond plastering over pain points in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 苹果供应商富士康第二季度利润同比增长 6%，超出预期
item.description: 苹果供应商富士康周三公布，受人工智能服务器需求强劲的推动，第二季度净利润增长 6%。【原文：Apple supplier Foxconn reported on Wednesday a 6% rise in second-quarter net profit, driven by strong AI server demand.】

item.title: 欧洲最大的旅游运营商 TUI 第三季度业绩强劲，原因是夏季预订火爆
item.description: 欧洲最大的旅游运营商 TUI 周三公布的第三季度营业利润超出预期，这主要得益于强劲的夏季旅游需求和德国竞争对手 FTI 的破产。【原文：Europe's largest tour operator TUI on Wednesday beat third-quarter operating profit expectations thanks to strong summer travel demand and a boost from German rival FTI's bankruptcy.】

item.title: 迄今为止，融资条件通过了全球大跌的考验
item.description: 本月金融市场的剧烈抛售几乎没有破坏全球融资条件，但进一步波动的风险意味着借款人尚未走出困境。【原文：A tumultuous sell-off in financial markets this month has barely scathed global financing conditions, but the risk of further volatility means borrowers are not yet out of the woods.】

item.title: 一次性支出导致蒂森克虏伯出现季度净亏损
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯集团（Thyssenkrupp）周三表示，由于工厂工程业务遗留项目的成本高于预期，该集团第三财季净亏损转为亏损。【原文：Thyssenkrupp swung to a net loss in its fiscal third quarter due to higher-than-expected costs for legacy projects at its plant engineering business, the conglomerate said on Wednesday, adding it had also halted the sales process for one of its units.】

item.title: 瑞银第二季度实现净利润 11 亿美元
item.description: 瑞银集团周三公布，4-6 月份净利润为 11.4 亿美元，这是该银行与曾经的竞争对手瑞士信贷完成正式合法合并后的首份业绩报告。【原文：UBS reported on Wednesday a net profit of $1.14 billion for the April-June period, the first results since the completion of the bank's formal legal merger with its one-time rival Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 瑞银集团公布第二季度股东应占净利润为 11 亿美元
item.description: 瑞银集团周三公布，第二季度归属于股东的净利润为 11.4 亿美元，而分析师在公司提供的民意调查中预测的净利润为 5.28 亿美元。【原文：UBS Group on Wednesday reported a net profit of $1.14 billion attributable to shareholders in the second quarter, which compared with the $528 million forecast by analysts in a company-provided poll.】

item.title: 早安欢迎加入切割俱乐部，新西兰人
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 工会能否阻止世界最大铜矿的生产？
item.description: 必和必拓（BHP）的埃斯孔迪达（Escondida）铜矿在 2023 年的产量将占全球铜产量的近 5%，该矿的罢工背后是一个强大的工会，该工会正寻求阻断该矿的生产，以争取更大的利润份额。【原文：A powerful workers union behind a strike at BHP's huge Escondida mine, which produced nearly 5% of the world's copper in 2023, is looking to snarl production at the site as it pushes for a bigger share of profits.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，士力架制造商玛氏将以每股 83.50 美元的价格收购凯兰诺华
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，家族包装食品巨头玛氏公司（旗下糖果品牌包括 M&M's 和士力架）预计将以每股 83.50 美元的价格收购食品制造商 Kellanova。【原文：Family-owned packaged food giant Mars, whose candy brands include M&M's and Snickers, is expected to pay $83.50 per share for food maker Kellanova , the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新西兰降息，亚洲股市上涨，新西兰元下跌
item.description: 周三，在疲软的美国生产者价格数据激起了消费者价格通胀将趋于温和的希望之后，亚洲股市上涨，美元收跌，从而导致债券收益率走低。【原文：Asian shares rose and the dollar nursed losses on Wednesday after soft U.S. producer prices data stirred hopes that consumer price inflation would be benign, sending bond yields lower.】

item.title: 新西兰中央银行四年多来首次降息，标志着未来将采取更多宽松政策
item.description: 新西兰央行周三将基准现金利率下调至5.25%，这是自2020年3月以来的首次宽松政策，并表示随着通胀率向1%至3%的目标靠拢，未来还会有更多的降息举措。【原文：New Zealand's central bank cut the benchmark cash rate to 5.25% on Wednesday, its first policy easing since March 2020 and flagged more cuts ahead as inflation was converging on its target of 1% to 3%.】

item.title: 美国原油库存预计下降，石油走强
item.description: 周三，油价攀升，原因是估计美国原油和汽油库存将减少，市场正在关注中东战争可能扩大，从而可能减少全球石油供应。【原文：Oil prices climbed on Wednesday on estimates about shrinking U.S. crude and gasoline inventories as the market watched for a possible widening of the Middle Eastern war, which could curtail global oil supplies.】

item.title: 通胀数据利好，美元下跌；新西兰央行决议前，新西兰元坚挺
item.description: 美元兑主要货币汇率在隔夜下跌后，周三继续走低，原因是美国生产者价格的乐观数据加强了对美联储今年降息的押注。【原文：The dollar remained on the back foot on Wednesday after tumbling versus major peers overnight as a benign reading for U.S. producer prices reinforced bets on Federal Reserve interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 美国和英国工程师达成互认协议
item.description: 英国和美国的工程师达成了行业资格和执照互认协议，这将使专业人员在大西洋两岸工作更加方便。【原文：Engineers from Britain and the United States have struck a mutual recognition agreement of industry qualifications and licences which is set to make it easier for professionals to work on either side of the Atlantic.】

item.title: 聚焦：避开本土市场，韩国零售商扎堆美股
item.description: 韩国的母婴投资者不畏上周全球金融市场的颓势，将更多资金投入美股，分析师和投资者打赌，由于国内价值主张低迷，这一持续多年的趋势将继续下去。【原文：South Korea's mom-and-pop investors are defying last week's global financial markets rout by pouring even more funds into U.S. stocks, a years-long trend that analysts and investors bet will continue due to the depressed value proposition at home.】

item.title: 加州允许中国机器人出租车公司 WeRide 对乘客进行测试
item.description: 中国自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 已获得加利福尼亚州公共事业监管机构的许可，可以测试其载客无人驾驶汽车。【原文：China-based autonomous driving startup WeRide has received approval from California to test its driverless vehicles with passengers, according to a permit from the state's utility regulator.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构就交易平台更换问题起诉交易所运营商 ASX
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构周三表示，将起诉澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX），指控其在更换交易平台 "清算所电子分册系统"（CHESS）方面作出误导性陈述。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Wednesday it was suing the country's bourse operator ASX Ltd for making misleading statements regarding the replacement of its trading platform Clearing House Electronic Subregister System (CHESS).】

item.title: 受中国经济放缓影响，日本 8 月商业景气下滑：路透调查
item.description: 路透社 Tankan 月度调查周三显示，由于中国需求低迷拖累了企业情绪，8 月份日本制造商对经营状况的信心略有下降，服务业的情绪也有所缓和。【原文：Japanese manufacturers turned slightly less confident about business conditions in August and the service sector's mood eased, the monthly Reuters Tankan survey found on Wednesday, as lacklustre demand from China weighed on corporate sentiment.】

item.title: 经济学家称美国提前进口降低了潜在海港罢工的风险
item.description: 一位贸易经济学家周二表示，如果纽约和休斯顿等重要海港的工人在10月份罢工，美国零售商提前进口返校、万圣节和圣诞节假期的货物，可以减少货物延误和经济损失。【原文：U.S. retailers' early back-to-school, Halloween and Christmas holiday imports could lessen cargo delays and financial damage should workers at vital seaports such as New York and Houston strike in October, a trade economist said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 比特币矿商 Riot Platforms 增持竞争对手 Bitfarms 股份至 18.9
item.description: 比特币矿商 Riot Platforms 周二表示，已将其在竞争对手 Bitfarms 的股份增至 18.9%。【原文：Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms said on Tuesday it had increased its stake in rival Bitfarms to 18.9%.】

item.title: 英特尔出售芯片设计公司 Arm Holdings 股份
item.description: 英特尔周二提交的一份监管文件显示，英特尔已出售其持有的英国芯片设计公司Arm Holdings的118万股股票。【原文：Intel has sold its 1.18 million shares in British chip designer Arm Holdings , a regulatory filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国正在考虑拆分谷歌
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，在法官裁定科技巨头非法垄断在线搜索市场一周后，美国司法部正在考虑包括解散 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司在内的各种方案。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice is considering options that include breaking up Alphabet's Google, a week after a judge ruled the tech giant illegally monopolized the online search market, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场摆脱震荡，但能否持久？
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长表示，卢拉将在未来几周任命新的央行行长
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）将在未来几周内宣布央行现任行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）在今年任期结束后的领导人选。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday that President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's choice to lead the central bank after the end of current chief Roberto Campos Neto's term this year will be announced in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 由于竞争导致利润率下降，澳大利亚贷款机构 CBA 的年度现金利润下降 3
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）周三表示，由于成本上升和竞争激烈导致利润率下降，该行年度现金利润下滑了 3%。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia said on Wednesday its annual cash profit slipped 3%, as its margins took a beating from rising costs and intense competition.】

item.title: 消息人士称，埃利奥特有望提议西南航空新董事会多数成员人选
item.description: 知情人士周二透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）预计将向西南航空公司发起董事会挑战，提名多达 10 名董事候选人，因为该对冲基金希望该公司撤换首席执行官并改善业绩。【原文：Elliott Investment Management is expected to launch a board room challenge at Southwest Airlines , nominating as many as 10 director candidates as the hedge fund wants the company to oust its chief executive officer and improve performance, sources said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西部长称，拉美航空考虑可能购买多达 30 架巴西航空工业公司喷气式飞机
item.description: 巴西港口和机场部长周二表示，拉美航空有可能从巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司购买多达 30 架飞机，因为该航空公司希望扩大在拉丁美洲最大经济体的业务。【原文：LATAM Airlines could potentially buy as many as 30 aircraft from Brazilian planemaker Embraer as the carrier looks to expand operations in Latin America's largest economy, Brazil's ports and airports minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州起诉通用汽车涉嫌收集、出售司机私人数据
item.description: 通用汽车公司被德克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）起诉，指控该汽车制造商在未经驾驶员同意的情况下将其私人数据出售给包括保险公司在内的多家公司。【原文：General Motors has been sued by Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, who accused the automaker of selling drivers' private data to several companies, including insurers, without their consent.】

item.title: 莱茵金属将斥资 9.5 亿美元收购军用车辆零部件制造商 Loc Performance
item.description: 德国莱茵金属防务集团周二表示，将以 9.5 亿美元的价格收购美国军用车辆零部件制造商 Loc Performance。【原文：Rheinmetall would buy U.S.-based military vehicle parts maker Loc Performance in a $950 million deal, the German defense group said on Tuesday.】
